import { Controls, Canvas, Meta } from '@storybook/blocks';
import * as AnchorListItemStory from './anchor-list-item.stories';

<Meta of={AnchorListItemStory} />

# AnchorListItem

## Overview

AnchorListItem is a component that display an item in the list. Can be used as a replacement for `li` tag in `preview` file - serves to build story page navigation.

<Canvas of={AnchorListItemStory.Overview} />

## Props

<Controls />

<Tip title="Not what you were looking for?">
  If you need to render list in the story text check out the<Link href="/?path=/docs/components-unstyledlist--docs" size={Link.sizes.SMALL}>UnstyledList</Link>component.
</Tip>
